casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. STAATS
v.
STARK CTY. PROSECUTOR'S OFFICE. 2017-1443 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 14, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Mandamus. On respondent's motion to find relator a vexatious litigator pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. 4.3(B). Motion denied. On relator's motion to strike motion to find relator a vexatious litigator. Motion denied as moot.
